headline: Investments in smart grid technology keep lights on for DTE customers, preventing more than 16,000 outages so far this year
summary: DETROIT, Sept. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DTE Energy (NYSE:DTE) today announced a milestone in its work to improve electric reliability for customers. So far this year, DTE’s smart grid devices have prevented more than 16,000 outages throughout DTE’s electric service territory. Accelerating the deployment of these smart devices is a critical component of DTE’s five-year, $10 billion plan to build the electric grid of the future and deliver on its commitment to reduce power outages by 30% and c

content.title: Investments in smart grid technology keep lights on for DTE customers, preventing more than 16,000 outages so far this year
